パッケージ cards

  • クラスのサマリー 
    クラス 説明
    AutoSortedCards
    You can draw a card randomly, but you cannot draw top card of cards.
    BaseCards  
    CardAffiliation
    This class have to be extended carefully avoid to card duplication.
    Cards
    This class is high-functioning than BaseCards.
    Deck
    When you construct a deck, a set of cards are set automatically.
    Hand
    Auto sorted hand.
    OrderedCards
    You can draw top card of cards, and cannot draw random card.
    Trash
    This class is singleton, and ANY card can be included in this instance to trash.
